title: Text of a Letter from the President to the Chairmen of Certain Congressional Committees â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
August 17, 2018
Dear Mr. Chairman:I am providing the Macedonia NATO Accession Report, prepared consistent with section 3(2)(E)(i) of the Resolution of Advice and Consent to Ratification of the Protocols to the North Atlantic Treaty of 1949 on the Accession of Poland, Hungary, and the Czech Republic of April 30, 1998Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
